name: Doc Apocalypse
storyline: The year is 1953, and scientist Lewis P. Higgins is on the verge of a revolutionary discovery, an invention that can manipulate weather. Looking to prove his theories, Higgins begins an experiment that yields startling results. It also attracts the attention of an off-world alien species, which launches a series of devastating attacks across the globe without warning, leaving the human race to respond with their very last option: a nuclear strike...
summary:
Professor Higgins weather experiment has caused the apocalypse! Help him reach his family and a way to reverse this mistake which has earned him the name Doc Apocalypse...

The game is played as a classic point-and-click adventure. Players guide Lewis a.k.a. 'Doc Apocalypse' through different scenes and you can interact with objects and character. You can have conversations with characters, examining the scenes and interact with objects. Gathered items get stored in an inventory near the bottom of the screen. Some items might also be combined. The puzzles are based on interaction with the environment and it's objects and by having conversations with the characters. You cannot die in this adventure game.
